title: owncloud webdav finder issue
body:
hi guys,

thanks for your hard work on owncloud. we are hosting some owncloud servers for mostly mac users and the webdav for them is very important. but in the newer osx versions it is not possible to drag and drop files in the webdav or it works very slow.


### expected behaviour
start copying file(s) to owncloud server

### actual behaviour
takes about 2 minutes to copy a 50kb file, while you wait you see this:
![schermafbeelding 2013-03-01 om 16 29 36](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/3583798/210130/0baf94c2-8287-11e2-8fd4-7c1cf9e8dc23.png)
saying: "the finder cant do this because some information in "filename" cant be read/write (errorcode -36)"
with owncloud 4.5.6 the upload works after a 2 minutes using a dns name and the following settings: https://vboxxcloud.nl/test2.php
same after updating to 4.5.7


with owncloud 4.5.7 the upload doesn't work after 2 minutes using a ip address and the following settings: http://94.100.21.13/info.php
the copying ends with this message
![schermafbeelding 2013-03-01 om 16 33 33](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/3583798/210182/621b1d44-8288-11e2-8e50-0ec47a9cba06.png)
after this message webdav mount disconnects.


### steps to reproduce
1. install owncloud using the advised steps:
http://doc.owncloud.com/server/2012.4.5/admin_manual/installation.html#centos-5-6
2. mount the .../remote.php/webdav/ using finder -> go -> network
3. drag a lokal file in there (.jpg in this case)

### server configuration
operating system:
centos 6 64bit (2.6.32-279.19.1.el6.x86_64)

web server: 
apache2.2.15

database:
mysql

php version:
5.3.3

owncloud version:
4.5.7

### client configuration
browser:
apple finder

operating system:
osx 10.8.2
macbook pro
i7 16gb ram with ssd setup

(same with 10.7)


### logs


#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
owncloud runs in debug mode and no log entries.
```
